review: It works good, easy to use and portable. I use it with amazon prime and netflix
author: Edward Dewar

review: I wanted something  that would play all my required apps since I cut cable.  Amazon of course, Hulu, and Netflix.  Very easy to use and set up.
author: Aaron Mingle

review: I love this!  The content is great and super easy to install.  I would recommend this to anyone wanting many options  to view.
author: Mary L. Hill

review: We love it! Specially my kids :)
author: Viviana David

review: Love it!  Getting another one for bedroom!
author: Susan H. Bell

review: This thing is everything I thought it would be, I bought to add a TV in the house since I cut the cord but I like it so much I am going to get another to replace my old Roku.
author: Eddie Haskell

review: Couldn't keep this connected to my internet even though no other devices in my house had any problems at all. Tried resetting it and unplugging etc-still not able to recognize or connect after the first day. Loved what I saw before it stopped working and was very excited to use it. Now it is just setting on a shelf collecting dust...😒
author: MR
